channel.title: Changing the crown and text color of Owner [HELP]
channel.description:
Hello, i am running on a 474 and its the Hybrid PvP client.
i just need help on figuring out how to change the text color for only the Owner to a red color, and also i need to know how to change the Owners crown next to there name, i want to change it to a diffrent crown img. so if anyone could help me that would be awesome. ;D

item.title: Changing the crown and text color of Owner [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @iz3_legend iz3 legend
item.description:
@iz3_legend wrote:

for the crown you would check client/cache/sprites or where ever sprites is located if you cant find the crown you could use Toms Cache editor to find it and change it, there are tuts to use the cache editor on thees fourms just use the search box and i dont know about the text colors

Read full topic
